rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows facing east and north for ample natural light; integrates Vastu principles of positive energy flow.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room with a west-facing window ensuring ventilation; designed in accordance with Vastu guidelines for social interactions.
Functional kitchen space on the north side with east-west windows promoting balanced light and adherence to Vastu principles; connected to dining area.
Large master bedroom located towards the north-east corner for positive energy flow with a private balcony and west facing window for ventilation; designed as per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious bedroom oriented to the east to harness morning sunlight while respecting privacy; integrates natural light and ventilation following local norms.
Bedroom for second child positioned in the southeast direction ensuring balanced energy, natural light, and proper airflow; designed with Vastu principles.
Guest lounge area adjacent to dining space, featuring north-east orientation to invite positivity and ample ventilation.
Ensuite bathroom attached to master bedroom with adequate privacy; includes natural light features and ensures good airflow in accordance with local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance designed on the south side for controlled access, incorporating Vastu principles to maintain energy balance.
Service entrance for deliveries and staff ensuring a separate pathway from living areas.
Dedicated access for the private gym located in an adjoining structure to maintain privacy and energy flow.

additional_structures.description: A dedicated gym facility built adjacent to the main farmhouse, with south-facing windows to harness natural light while ensuring a cool environment; designed with Vastu guidelines for activity and movement.
